scenario_text.value: I’m fine. No need to yell at me.

Why are you so worked up about protecting me
anyway?

And what makes you three so stubborn? You
don’t look like serious monsters to me.
I don’t get them at all.
Though I guess, they are kind of like me.
They crawl around on the ground.

They keep moving, even if it ain’t pretty,
and they won’t give up.
You kinda can’t help but take pity on ’em.

I told ya already, didn’t I? I can tell
you’re just as determined as me.

Oh, you wanna see how determined I am? I’ll
show you... I can be like Takuma... *cough*

Let’s go, partner! We’ll show them what we’re
made of!
You... You’re flying! Hey, that’s incredible!

That’s your new form, huh? Well, time to put
it to good use, Flymon!
